title: Customer Queue Management System
description: A queue system that prioritizes customers based on their state (e.g., Regular or Priority). It manages customer order, serving, and insertion using a custom doubly-ended queue structure.

title: Binary Search Tree Implementation
description: An implementation of a binary search tree (BST) that supports insertion, deletion, search and replace operations. The BST interface lets you add nodes, delete nodes, search values, and run traversals.
